title: I Count 100 Things
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 65 words, Level D (Grade 1), Lexile 150L
description: I Count 100 Things explores ways in which common items such as gumdrops and marshmallows can be manipulated into different objects, such as a rainbow and an igloo. Pictures and repetitive text support the early reader.
meta: count, gumdrops, igloo, marshmallow, paperclips, rainbow
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Rhyme : Identify and write words that rhyme with make
Exclamation Marks : Recognize the purpose of an exclamation point for punctuation and expression
Compound Words : Identify and segment compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
